name: RCA Manufacturing Company, Incorporated
biography: In 1934, the RCA Manufacturing Company, Inc. was formed into which the RCA Victor Company, Inc. and the RCA Radiotron Company, Inc., were merged as divisions. RCA was one of America’s leading manufacturers and retailers of radios, phonographs, televisions, and a wide range of consumer and military electronics products. The company was also a pioneer in radio and television networks.
